question: Who launched the initiative “Design Education Quality Mark” ?
option4: Indian Institute of Art and Design
explanation: The India Design Council (IDC) launched the Design Education Quality Mark (DEQM) and Chartered Designs of India (CDI) in New Delhi on 12 December 2019. The designs are aimed to address 5 challenges of scale, quality of design, quality of education for design, raising the priority for design in industry and design for a public purpose. The two initiatives will aid and support the profession of design. It will help to enhance the profession and to establish professional standards. The DEQM will act as a benchmark design education programmes on predetermined standards. It will grant Design Education Quality Mark to institutions that meet the provisions of the published standard.
